医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
Owlstone Medical从囊性纤维化基金会获得投资Owlstone Medical ("Owlstone"), the global leader in Breath Biopsy® for applications in early disease detection and precision medicine, today announced that the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation has made an up to USD $2.3 million equity investment (circa £1.7 million) in Owlstone to develop a breath test for Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA) detection in patients with cystic fibrosis (CF). https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/owlstone-medical-secures-secures-investment-from-cystic-fibrosis-foundation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/owlstone-medical-secures-secures-investment-from-cystic-fibrosis-foundation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f213dc7-96d3-4599-4599-9c86-0756ac793e4f Sat, 29 Mar 2025 00:40:00 -0400 Owlstone Medical secures investment from Cystic Fibrosis Foundation
巨人基金会和美国心脏协会促进挽救生命的心肺复苏术技能美国心脏协会和巨人基金会是纽约巨人的非营利组织，从3月20日在Metlife Stadium招募了12所当地学校的代表进行心肺复苏（CPR）和自动化的外部除颤器（AED）培训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/the-giants-foundation-and-merican-hend-shert-association-promote-life-saving-cpr-skills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/the-giants-foundation-and-merican-hend-shert-association-promote-life-saving-saving-cpr-skills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=391d852b-d0a4-4eb4-4eb4-adeb-b5bf96ae2c77 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:37:00 -0400 The Giants Foundation and American Heart Association promote life-saving CPR skills
研究发现某些癌症中如何发生对化学疗法的耐药性弥米布林格将军的研究人员发现了某些癌症对化学疗法的耐药性如何发生。研究人员专注于利用活性氧（ROS）杀死癌细胞的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/study-uncovers-how-esistance-to-chemotherapies-may-ccur-in-some-insome-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/study-uncovers-how-esistance-to-chemotherapies-may-ccur-in-some-insome-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bded2863-7ad3-43a4-88b1-52fcfb98d7b8 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:34:40 -0400 Study uncovers how resistance to chemotherapies may occur in some cancers
基于AI的工具旨在改善疾病控制的蚊子鉴定形态是对生物体形式和结构的研究，包括它们的物理特征，例如形状，大小和零件排列。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/AI-based-tool-aims-to-improve-mosquito-identification-for-disease-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/AI-based-tool-aims-to-improve-mosquito-identification-for-disease-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0303b08d-3f8f-4910-BF6B-2C01558F8E12 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:31:08 -0400 AI-based tool aims to improve mosquito identification for disease control
新的PCR测试为细菌性阴道病更好地治疗提供了希望在美国，三分之一的14-49岁妇女中有一个在其一生中形成了被称为细菌性阴道病（BV）的阴道细菌失衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/new-pcr-test-forders-hope-for-for-for-better-wareatment-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/new-pcr-test-forders-hope-for-for-for-better-wareatment-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66204efa-a17d-4f14-8c47777-d436660fcbb65 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:28:31 -0400 New PCR test offers hope for better treatment of bacterial vaginosis
埃默里团队将心脏病研究带到国际空间站心脏病仍然是美国死亡的主要原因，占五分之一的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/emory-team-takes-diseash-disease-research-to-to-the-the-the-internation-space-station.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/emory-team-takes-diseash-disease-research-to-to-the-the-the-internations-pace-station.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da279360-1c2222-42d2-b52b-096070374a5f Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:26:19 -0400 Emory team takes heart disease research to the International Space Station
研究探索预防疾病的植物中的生物活性化合物水果和植物提取物含有生物活性化合物，可以帮助治疗或预防疾病。为了表征和理解其行动机制，来自巴西和德国大学和研究机构的研究人员进行了独立但互补的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/studies-explore-bioactive-comcounds-in-plants-fort-for-disease-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/studies-explore-bioactive-comcounds-compounds-in-plants-fort-for-disease-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1CE8E14F-352B-4E15-9CD9-FB51F1F16B2A24 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:05:00 -0400 Studies explore bioactive compounds in plants for disease prevention
六个有前途的生物标志物可以改善肾脏损伤的早期和准确检测Critical PathInstitute®（C-Path）和波士顿医疗中心（BMC）为六种生物标志物发表了结果，可以改善肾脏损伤的早期和准确检测，从而导致所有患者的更安全药物的发展和更好的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/six-promisish-biomarkers-could-imbrove-early-ally-and-accurate-detection-of-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/six-promisish-biomarkers-could-improve-early-ally-and-accurate-detection-of-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A5D050fd-44f3-4a9b-9e8f-4020AD37971F Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:03:00 -0400 Six promising biomarkers could improve early and accurate detection of kidney injury
3D打印水凝胶为半月板撕裂治疗提供了新的希望半月板眼泪是常见的膝盖受伤，由于修复选择有限，患者和医生长期以来一直感到沮丧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/3d-printed-hydrogel-newers-new-new-hope-for-meniscus-tear-woreatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/3d-printed-hydrogel-finders-new-hope-for-meniscus-tear-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c67f5C51-273-47C5-47C5-AF3C-6356F8A3427B Fri, 28 Mar 2025 22:59:00 -0400 3D-printed hydrogel offers new hope for meniscus tear treatment
冷水浸泡会增强细胞健康和弹性有没有想过当您进行那些时尚的冰浴时，您的身体会发生什么？渥太华大学的科学家刚刚发现，这非常有趣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/cold-water-immersion-boosts-cellular-health-health-health-resilience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/cold-water-immersion-boosts-cellular-health-health-health-nealth-resilience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f46A4050-A652-4240-A053-12BAD0BF47D3 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 22:57:00 -0400 Cold water immersion boosts cellular health and resilience
